entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 4:46AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...RAIN AND HIGH FREEZING LEVELS ON TOP OF A HIGH SNOWPACK COULD PROMPT NUISANCE FLOODING INTO MONDAY... Rain and warmer temperatures are expected to continue this week.
